title: Settings.js Refactoring Patterns
details:
Refactored sidebar/settings.js to improve CodeScene code health from 8.88 to 10.0.

Patterns used:
1. Validation Rules Pattern: Replaced multiple if/throw conditions with LOG_VALIDATION_RULES array containing {condition, message/messageBuilder}
2. Settings Gatherer Pattern: Extracted gatherSettingsFromForm() into 8 helper functions (_gatherCopyUrlSettings, _gatherCopyTextSettings, etc.) and used object spread
3. Tab Handler Map Pattern: Replaced if/else if for tab switching with PRIMARY_TAB_HANDLERS map and extracted _switchToSettingsTab/_switchToManagerTab

Key complexity reductions:
- _validateCollectedLogs: cc 13 → ~3 (loop over rules)
- gatherSettingsFromForm: cc 13 → 1 (just combines helpers)
- handlePrimaryTabSwitch: cc 10 → ~3 (handler lookup)
